data.title: 2024 LEE JOON GI ASIA TOUR <JOONGI‘S DAY: FESTIVAL> IN MACAU
data.description:
2024 LEE JOON GI ASIA TOUR JOONGI’S DAY : FESTIVAL is coming to Macau

2024 LEE JOON GI ASIA TOUR JOONGI’S DAY : FESTIVAL 即將嚟到澳門啦


In addition to performances and interactive sessions, LEE JOON GI has prepared many special benefits for fans

Besides signed posters, there are 1:1 photos, 1:20 group photos, sound check access, and HI-BYE sessions

Are you excited? Remember to get your tickets on November 25th!

除咗有歌舞表演同埋互動環節，今次李準基仲精心咁準備咗好多福利畀咁多位粉絲

除咗親簽海報之外，仲有1:1 合照、1:20 合照、彩排觀賞、HI-BYE等

係咪好期待呢？記住11月25號去搶飛啦


Date & Time 時間: 2024/12/28 (SAT) 6:00PM

Venue 地點: 澳門新濠影滙綜藝館 MACAU STUDIO CITY EVENT CENTER


General Sale 公開售票

2024/11/25 (MON) 12:00 Noon Local time


Ticket Price 門票價格 （未包含服務費）

-A HKD$1688

-B HKD$1388

-C HKD$1088

-D HKD$888

-E HKD$688




Fan benefits: personalized signed poster, 1:1 photo, 1:20 group photo, rehearsal viewing, HI-BYE, signed poster

粉絲福利：親簽粉絲姓名海報、1:1 合照、1:20 合照、彩排觀賞、HI-BYE、親簽海報


12月17號23:59截止福利

12月20號12:00於主辦單位社交平臺上公佈福利名單


Ticket Delivery 實體門票寄送

*Fantopia physical tickets will be delivered starting on December 07 2024. Please enter the correct information (eg. address & phone number) when you purchase the tickets. You can track the status of ticket deliveries through "Fantopia- My Tickets". Ticket purchasers from outside Mainland, Hong Kong and Macau: Tickets will be collected at the ticket office on the day of the event. The delivery service is only available for tickets purchased before December 15, 2024. Tickets purchased after December 15, 2024 will be picked up at the ticket office on the day of the event.

Fantopia訂購成功之實體門票將於2024年12月07日起陸續寄出，請您在購票時輸入準確地址電話等正確訊息，門票寄出後，您可透過“Fantopia-我的門票”關注門票寄送狀態。中國大陸港澳之外的購票者：將於活動當日前往票務處領取門票。寄送服務僅提供於2024年12月15日前購買的門票，2024年12月15日後購買的門票將於活動當日前往票務處領取門票



*Each ticket is assigned a specific seat.

所有票價均為坐席(對號入座)。

*Must complete ticketing website member registration before proceeding any ticket purchase.

請記得預先登記成為各票務網站會員才可購票

*Purchase limit is 6 tickets per show per transaction for general sale.

公開售票每人每交易限購六張票券。

*One person per ticket regardless of age. A valid ticket is required for admission

每張門票只供一人進場。入場時必需持有有效門票。

*If a ticket is lost, damaged, defaced or stolen, the organizer and ticketing agency will not reissue or replace the ticket, and will not bear any responsibility. Please keep your ticket carefully.

演出門票如有遺失、損毀、塗污或被竊，主辦及售票機構概不補發或更換門票，亦不會承擔任何責任，敬請小心保管。

*We do not offer returns or exchanges

售出門票不設退換

eventsEntity.entityAdress: RM 413,4/F LUCKY CTR 165-171WAN CHAI RD WAN CHAI HK
